main.name: Saima Akter
main.bio: Hi there! I have been very passionate about frontend web development and software engineering. I dream to be an expert software engineer so that I can build professional and useful software that has business value. I have 2years of experience in frontend web development. I am looking for a mid-level software engineer position in a reputed software company that can help me to achieve my goal.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to to build any software for your business.!

quotes1.title: I Would Love to make your Ideas real with my skills
quotes1.description: I am Front End Developer. I am Proficient in modern website design. I specialize in pixel-perfect responsive design with VueJs, NuxtJs, Vuetify, HTML5, CSS3, Flexbox, Bootstrap, MD Bootstrap, ES6, JavaScript. I also have solid knowledge working with React, Redux, server-side Php and MySQL database.

quotes2.title: I can give your business a new creative start right away! Hire me for your Awesome project

projects.title: Youth Next Opportunities
projects.description: A responsive website containing Opportunities for youth where you can explore all the opportunities across the globe. You can explore upcoming opportunities, internships, scholarships, fellowships, competitions, conferences with their details. Here you also can post new opportunity which you want to share with people.
projects.tools: VueJS, Vuetify, Vue- Router, SASS, Vue-editor, Vue-Swipper.

projects.title: Event Champ
projects.tools: NuxtJS, Vuetify, CSS, Vue-editor2, Vue-Swipper, Vue-lightgallery.
projects.description: An Event management website. You can also visit all the Venues and Locations, Blogs, event Listing Scheduler, online ticket selling and post your own events by Sign Up and Sign In to the website. You can also check the speakers and their profiles. This project also contains an admin panel to control all the activities of users.

projects.title: Gen Air Limited
projects.tools: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, JQuery, Php and MySQL.
projects.description: A full-stack multi-vendors ecommerce website where you can order industrial elements. This also contains admin panel to control the entire sites with multiple user roles and activities.
